snippet: Melania Trump, a reluctant campaigner thus far, will take a greater role as her husband’s missteps have hurt his standing among women.
abstract: Donald J Trump enlists his wife Melania Trump in his presidential campaign in effort to build up support among women voters.

byline.contributor: Maggie Haberman contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Melania Trump, a reluctant campaigner thus far, will take a greater role as her husband’s missteps have hurt his standing among women.

headline.main: Donald Trump, Stumbling With Women, Enlists Wife to Campaign
headline.print_headline: Trump, Stumbling With Women, Enlists His Wife
